original_text: and what he did to the army of Egypt, to their horses and to their chariots, how he made the water of the Red Sea flow over them as they pursued after you, and how the Lord has destroyed them to this day,
korean_text: 또 여호와께서 애굽 군대와 그 말과 그 병거에 행하신 일 곧 그들이 너희를 뒤쫓을 때에 홍해 물로 그들을 덮어 멸하사 오늘까지 이른 것과

sentences.original_text: and what he did to the army of Egypt
to their horses and to their chariots
how he made the water of the Red Sea flow over them
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 어떻게 홍해의 물을 그들 위로 흘러넘치게 하였는지

sentences.original_text: and how the Lord has destroyed them to this day
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 주께서 오늘까지 그들을 어떻게 멸망시켰는지
